definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: divide, cleave (NH Pi. tear spart; Targum: Jer Pa. La 3:11 tear in pieces (for HCT [[פִּשֵּׁחַ]]));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. (c. acc. cogn. [[שֶׁ֫סַע]]): ms. [[וְשׁׂסַע]] [[שֶׁסַע פַּרְסָה]] Le 11:7 (P; on ´[[שׁׂ]]: cf. Lag:BN 84) cleaving the cleft of the hoof, i.e. having cloven hoof, so fs. [[שׁׂסַ֫עַת]] v:Le 11:3, cf. De 14:6; [[שֶׁסַע אֵינֶנׇּה שׁׂסַ֫עַת]] Le 11:26 (P); pass. [[הַפַּרְסָה הַשְּׁסוּעָה]] De 14:7.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: tear in two, a lion, kid, Impf., Inf. cstr. [[וַיְשַׁסְּעֵהוּ כְּשַׁסַּע]] [[הַגְּדִי]] Ju Jdg 14:6; a bird (by, or at, its wings), Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְשִׁסַּע אׂתוֹ]] Le 1:17 (P); impf. 3 ms. ([[אֶת־אֲנׇשָׁיו בַּדְּבָרִים]]) [[וַיְשַׁסַּע]] 1Sa 24:8 gives too violent a meaning; prob. crpt. for word = restrain, or the like Dr HPS, cf. Bu Now (hesitantly).
